name: Dr Graeme Sweeney
goal:
To represent the interests of numerous stakeholders on CCS.

To advise on CCS as a key technology for combating climate change for all CO2 emitting industries, including energy intensive industry, hydrogen producers and producers of biofuels
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Policies to combat climate change and to reduce the emissions of CO2, specifically using Carbon Capture and Storage and Carbon Capture and Utilisation
